order.name: Sims 4
order.description: Explore and customize every detail, from Sims to homes and much more. Choose how Sims look, act, and dress. Determine how theyâ€™ll live out each day.

order.name: Cooking Mama: Cookstar
order.description: This is a cooking simulation game in which players create and prepare dishes by completing cooking tasks (e.g., chopping, grating, fileting, frying)

order.name: DOOM 3
order.description: This is a first-person shooter in which players assume the role of a marine battling a demonic invasion at a Mars base. Players use big variety of guns to kill mutants and demonic creatures.

order.name: Epic Shef
order.description: This is an adventure game in which players assume the role of a young chef exploring the land, harvesting crops, and cooking dishes to battle in culinary duels.

order.name: Life is Strange: Before the storm
order.description: It is a game in which players assume the role of a high-school student investigating a family secret. Players are presented with various dialogue choices that change the course of the narrative.
order.alt: Life is Strange: Before the storm

order.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
order.description: The game's main story revolves around the player's character, the Dragonborn, on their quest to defeat Alduin the World-Eater, a dragon who is prophesied to destroy the world.
